title: President Rajapaksa fetes best O/L students in the Island
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) The government of Sri Lanka recognized over 134 students who performed outstandingly at the highly competitive national exam- G.C.E. Ordinary Level examination in December 2010. These young talents, the country’s best students who scored highest marks received their medals, certificates and gift packs including a…
